verbs.description: With a bleep on live television and [ARG1: double fists] [V: raised] [ARGM-LOC: in the air] , Robert De Niro got the theater crowd on its feet at the Tony Awards with a rousing political introduction of his old friend Bruce Springsteen that was focused squarely elsewhere : on President Donald Trump .

[ARGM-MNR: With a bleep on live television and double fists raised in the air] , [ARG0: Robert De Niro] [V: got] [ARG1: the theater crowd on its feet] [ARGM-LOC: at the Tony Awards] [ARGM-MNR: with a rousing political introduction of his old friend Bruce Springsteen that was focused squarely elsewhere : on President Donald Trump] .

With a bleep on live television and double fists raised in the air , Robert De Niro got the theater crowd on its feet at the Tony Awards with a rousing political introduction of his old friend Bruce Springsteen that [V: was] focused squarely elsewhere : on President Donald Trump .

With a bleep on live television and double fists raised in the air , Robert De Niro got the theater crowd on its feet at the Tony Awards with [ARG1: a rousing political introduction of his old friend Bruce Springsteen] [R-ARG1: that] was [V: focused] [ARGM-MNR: squarely elsewhere] : [ARG2: on President Donald Trump] .
